item.title: Mac Setup 2022
item.description: MacBook Pro Specification 13-inch Apple M1 Pro M1 2020 16 GB RAM 512 GB SSD QWERTY = English/Hebrew macOS Monterey (Update always) Homebrew Install Homebrew as package manager for macOS: 1## paste in terminal and follow the instructions 2/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Update everything in Homebrew to recent version: 1brew update Add additional source for casks: 1brew tap homebrew/cask-versions Install GUI applications (read more about these in GUI Applications): 1brew install --cask \ 2 all-in-one-messenger \ 3 deepl \ 4 canva \ 5 dbeaver-community \ 6 deepl \ 7 discord \ 8 disk-inventory-x \ 9 docker \ 10 figma \ 11 firefox \ 12 google-chrome \ 13 google-drive \ 14 grammarly \ 15 iterm2 \ 16 kap \ 17 macx-youtube-downloader \ 18 mongodb-compass \ 19 notion \ 20 obs \ 21 postman \ 22 rectangle \ 23 reverso \ 24 spark-ar-studio 25 spotify \ 26 sublime-text \ 27 syncthing \ 28 tor-browser \ 29 transmission \ 30 utm \ 31 viber \ 32 visual-studio-code \ 33 vlc \ 34 yandex-disk \ 35 zettlr \ 36 zoom Install terminal applications (read more about these in Terminal Applications):
